ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: RgDaN won some art show, and he said he would come back today, but today is almost over, and no RgDaN. ... Prowl looks from the empty chairs to Iron Raptor. It

RgDaN won some art show, and he said he would come back today, but today is 
almost over, and no RgDaN.

::Prowl/Striker::

Prowl looks from the empty chairs to Iron Raptor. It was obvious she was 
upset. He frowns as an idea comes to him, an idea that probably should have 
came a long time ago.

"Allright," he says, looking at Iron Raptor, "If Liono won't run this show, 
someone else needs to."

He sighs, his eyes a bit sad. He didn't like to do this, he was not a 
traitorous bot. But there was no choice. The maximals needed to be organized. 
Besides, Iron Raptor was upset, and he didn't like that.

"All maximals," he says to all the maximals over his comm-link, "Report to 
the war room immediately. That's an order."

he then notices Rhinox. "Hello, I am Prowl and this is Iron Raptor," he says 
as a greeting, "You are new?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker's eyes slightly widen as he hears Prowl over his comm-link. Things 
were taking an unexpected turn. He looks at Archangel and Sniper.

"Let's go see what Prowl has to say," he says, setting off toward the war 
room.
